House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03877
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 910, ENTITLED 'CREATING AN ENERGY DEVELOPMENT BOARD, DEFINING ITS POWERS AND FUNCTIONS, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES' AND MANDATING THE TRANSFER OF MALAMPAYA FUNDS TO THE GENERAL FUND SUBJECT TO CONGRESSIONAL APPROPRIATION FOR THE PURPOSE OF RENATIONALIZING THE COUNTRY'S POWER AND ENERGY INDUSTRY
